title: Error: "Grammarly is temporarily unavailable!" on Android
content:
If you see the error message "Grammarly is temporarily unavailable" while using Grammarly for Android, please try the following steps:
Open your deviceâ€™s settings, go to
Network
or
Connections
, and try to fix or reset network settings if such an option is available.
Switch between Wi-Fi and cellular connections and see if the issue is only happening on a particular network.
Close and reopen your keyboard.
Log out and log back in to Grammarly for Android.
Restart your device.
